content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. Let's start with the rental price. I am aiming for the highest possible price. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because seeking a lower price is my goal as a student with responsible financial habits. TERMINATE
name: Haoyu Wang from China
